name: Railroads & Catacombs: Prologue
description:
This is the prologue of the dark grim style roguelike game Railroads & Catacombs, developed for 5 years by Felipe Aulló, a sole developer from Spain, expected to be released in Q3 2023.

Players will board a train and lead their team through the land of madness and desolation. And you will need to make supply runs during the treacherous journey, surviving while already fallen into despair.



Make sure you are ready to face those sinister creatures.
Bosses will end your pathetic lives with no hesitation.



Navigate in skirmish and attack the enemy using a crushing blow.
Conquer the unknown or be conquered by it, nobody knows the answer...



The locomotive is connected to 12 different types of carriages, it’s the only sanctuary in this world of madness.
Get away from this ominous land, find a safe place.



Meet other survivors, 5 classes with unique deck builds.
What’s your choice, a soldier to fight with your? Or a backup stationed on the train?



Pairing two of the five combat styles, there are more than 120 card building combinations.
Find your meta combinations, so your venture may last longer...

Prologue content:

  • Assemble your vanguard squad by recruiting survivors with different classes.
  • Explore the first location, challenge 2 wicked bosses!
  • Learn about soldiers and engineers’ vital role on the journey!
